fields.name: Perks:
fields.value:
Divine Love: Roll an extra d8 each turn.
Insomnia: Your starting space bonus increases by $300 and rent is tripled.
Master of the Dungeon: This space also acts as a **_56 Hook** that only you can use. You may replace 1d6 with any standard DnD dice on your turn except the d20.
Vampiric: You may choose to roll an extra d12 but only collect half rent each turn.

Perks cost $300 each and may be bought in any order.
